data.title: Marks & Gran • Words • Kings Place
data.meta_description: The Emmy-winning writers of Birds of a Feather, The New Statesman & Goodnight Sweetheart on 60 years of friendship & comedy.
data.text:
Like Minded Friends with Tom Allen and Suzi Ruffell

A live recording of the hilarious podcast with two of the UK’s favourite comedians.

Sold out Find out more

Over The Top Under The Radar with Gary Younge and Carys Afoko

Breakout podcast, Over The Top Under The Radar, goes ‘LIVE’ for the first time at the London Podcast Festival. Join academic and award-winning journalist, Gary Younge, and communications guru, Carys Afoko, for their weekly critical look at the news stories that are either over-reported or fly completely under the radar.

Book tickets Find out more

Bust or Trust: A Kids' Mystery

Calling all Chief Detectives! Bust or Trust is an award-winning podcast for curious kids who’d like to get to the bottom of some of the world’s most interesting mysteries. From Big Foot to the Lost City of Atlantis, ‘Myth Truster’ Tiernan Douieb and ‘Myth Buster’ Athena Kugblenu take you through each case. But will you bust the myth or trust it?

Book tickets Find out more

Chart Music: The TOTP Podcast

After two back-to-back sell-outs, the call goes out to all Pop-Crazed Youngsters to assemble in the name of Chart Music for a brand-new LIVE show!

Book tickets Find out more
